headline: Joby Aviation buys giant Vandalia building for $61.5M as local growth speeds up
summary: Jan. 7—In a sign of accelerated growth, Joby Aviation said Wednesday it has agreed to buy a giant Vandalia building to use as a production site as it ramps up plans to make electric aircraft. The 728,000-square-foot building (the size of nearly four Walmart stores) at 1669 Capstone Way will support Joby's plans to double production to four aircraft a month in 2027, while also providing space ...
